This document shows regulatory variants identified in a cohort of 128 medulloblastoma samples from the ICGC PedBrain study and demonstrates some of the more advanced features of _Revana_ in action.

Open https://kitz-heidelberg.github.io/revana-demo-report/report.html to view the HTML report.

Use a current browser version for the optimal experience (features have been tested in Google Chrome)
